Text: Right, So When developers no longer write proggies for xp, or you buy a new game, or new hardware what will you use?, This sh*ts been floating around since the rc's of vista. Have you actually read the privacy agreements on any other os. Educate yourselves, don't listen to me and definately don't listen to Luke771! IMOA Your Privacy has been comprimised the second you sit down at a computer.
